titles.title: Sometimes I Feel Like Shouting Glory, Glory

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sometimes I feel like shouting glory, glory.
Sometimes I feel like shouting glory, glory.
For Christ took the chains from me, gave me peace and liberty
So sometimes I just feel like shouting glory.
